DOC.brief_summary: Iron deficiency ( ID ) affect 25 % Swedish infant severe ID associate cognitive behavioral problem . To avoid , iron supplement iron-fortified infant food recommend infant . However , optimal iron dose mode delivery yet establish . This concern excessive iron intake may impair growth increase morbidity iron-sufficient infant . Previous study suggest iron-fortified food may different effect iron supplement . In study , investigator investigate whether mode iron administration ( supplementation vs. fortification ) amount consume ( high intake vs. low intake ) affect iron absorption , iron utilization , zinc absorption healthy term non-iron-deficient 6-month-old infant .
